thread.section_title: Flizzr opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Flizzr | www.flizzr.com
thread.title: Massimo

author: Massimo
title: Massimo
text:
I received an invoice, in German - impossible to decipher - after my hire with additional charges I still do not understand.
I've emailed them - there is no phone number to contact - and have yet to hear from them. It's been almost a month now; but the money's been taken out of my account instantly.
The staff at the airport were extremely friendly and helpful; but the (lack of) service afterwards diametrically opposite.
DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY
